Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' leading to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all outcomes
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' leading to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all outcomes
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' that are followed by 'Request Payment'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Request Payment' for cases where activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' in relation to all declarations submitted
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' followed by 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Payment Handled' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' by 'STAFF MEMBER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' in each variant where it leads to payment
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' that result in a 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' to identify improvement areas
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' over 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' followed by any rejection activity
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' that are not dismissed compared to those that lead to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: the average of the function base != 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' performed by 'SYSTEM'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Average number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' that are followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' per case
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' with appeal
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' over 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Occasions how often the 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' is performed before 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' per month
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' activities
